originalText.text: I had my abdominoplasty completed on 10/4/18.  I can honestly say that Dr. Roland, his wife, and staff are absolutely amazing, kind, knowledgeable and friendly people. I am still recovering from my surgery however, I am loving my results thus far.  I would post pictures of before and after, but I‚Äôll let the Doctor do that. I feel amazing üíÅüèæ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

I am still recovering from my surgery however, I am loving my results thus far.  I would post pictures of before and after, but I‚Äôll let the Doctor do that. I feel amazing üíÅüèæ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

originalText.text: after two  and a half years since my surgery was done a tumor appear on my lower abdomen : i blame the drainer that was left without the cap the day of the surgery ; when i tried to contact the staff from his office they did not pay attention and i have to wait after my first follow up after four days. the thing is that in the mean time that  drainer  was not being drained , and due to this  i believe the tumor started forming.  i have a 10  cm tumor removed from my distal  rectus abdominus  , then i have to go through radiation.  I  thought will receive good attention from this office , but it was not in my case , felt really dissapointed .

originalText.text:
I went to dr Ronald to do my face and nose 5 years ago. I am lucky to be alive. They put me to sleep for about 10 hours. My ayes still have the scar of the stitches. I went to an eye specialist  in NYC consired to be the best in town and well known worldwide, and I was told that my eyes don't close in my sleep.  I was referred to an eye plastic.
I'm waiting for my appointment. My nose show no mayor change, I still have difficulties breathing from one nostril. Dr Ronald charged me $21 thousand dollars. They returned 5 thousand, but make me sign a letter so I could not take legal actions against the clinic. I am sorry I did that. On top of everything, I was sent home the same day, I was completely blind and crying and they didn't care. I have to live with this PSD. post traumatic Stress disorder for the rest of my life.
I wish I had investigate this place before making such a serious decision
PLEASE STAY AWAY FROM THIS DOCTOR.

originalText.text: Have not met the doctor yet, showed up today in a storm for my scheduled appointment and aparently it was cancelled due to an emergency. Emergencies happen, but that staff is condisendent and disrespectful. There was another patient/customer that also showed up as scheduled and was advised that the appointment was cancelled, and everyone was supposedly called in advance. When we asked the staff why no one left a message, they said they called and left messages for everyone. Othet customer questioned why it would be that both her and I have no missed calls or voicemails ‚ÄúB‚Äù (possibly the office manager )asked if the other customer was calling her a liar. The other customer told her hat she never said that. ‚ÄúB‚Äù challenged her, and responded by saying, ‚Äúthat‚Äôs how it sounds.‚Äù The customer told her that she wanted her name. ‚ÄúB‚Äù responded that her name is ‚ÄúB‚Äù customer asked for last name, and ‚ÄúB‚Äù said she‚Äôs under no obligation to give more. The customer told her this is bad customer service. Then ‚ÄúB‚Äù told the customer that she is being rude. The customer said ‚Äúwow, usually in a business people just apologize then their wrong. Especially when there were two customers present complaining of the same.‚Äù B said that she was going to apologize because everyone was called, ‚Äúcustomer said that she would complain to the doc.‚Äù B responded with ‚Äúwould you like me to schedule an appt with him‚Äù in a nutshell, great decor, very upscale, great reviews from Doctor (sad I didn‚Äôt get to meet him) but staff is very rude and lack professionalism and customer service. While I waited for another Uber to go home staff continued to criticize patient in my presence which I feel was utterly disrespectful. On my part, I was challenged too, but I time them that I didn‚Äôt want to engage in their lack of professionalism especially since it was a stretch for them. I knew early on I would write this review.

originalText.text: It's a nice place with amazing people. Donald Roland is an excellent doctor.

text.text: It's a nice place with amazing people. Donald Roland is an excellent doctor.
